criticism: The transferFrom function does not have proper checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set any user's balance by calling this function with a large value.
The transfer function does not have proper checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set any user's balance by calling this function with a large value.
The approve function does not have proper checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set any user's allowance by calling this function with a large value.
The transferFrom function lacks access control, allowing arbitrary transfers. An attacker can bypass this control by calling this function with any user's address.
The transfer function lacks access control, allowing arbitrary transfers. An attacker can bypass this control by calling this function with any user's address.
